EmailTemplate.name: Communities: DeactivationAlert to User
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!Community_Name} account deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!User.FirstName},
Your account is currently frozen and will be deactivated within a few days. If you would like to delete your account and all of your data (without the possibility to reactivate it), please send your request to: info@u-blox.com.
Best regards, u-blox Team
